findings.title: Precision error during fee calculation.
findings.description: In createLimitOrder() function of NFYTradingPlatform.sol precision error can occur at line 200 and 201 due to division before multiplication, which is not recommended for arithmetic calculations in Solidity.

findings.title: Unused variable - ETH
findings.description: A bytes32 constant variable named as ETH is declared but never used inside the NFYTradingPlatform contract.

findings.title: No mechanism to update rewardPool address.
findings.description: The rewardPool address in NFYTradingPlatform contract is set at the time of contract deployment which collects fees on every new limit order. Currently there is no mechanism present in the contract to update this address’s value.
